mapper.select: SELECT user_name,wrong_reason,sum(flag) flag,wrong_reason_id FROM wrong_selection WHERE status=0 and flag>0 and user_code=#{usercode} group by wrong_reason_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM single_selection where wrong_reason_id LIKE '%${wrongreasonid}%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM multiple_selection where wrong_reason_id LIKE '%${wrongreasonid}%'
SELECT id FROM single_selection where wrong_reason_id LIKE '%${wrongreasonid}%' order by rand() limit ${singlecount}
SELECT id FROM multiple_selection where wrong_reason_id LIKE '%${wrongreasonid}%' order by rand() limit ${multiplecount}
